sentences.en: a breathtaking view of the mountains
An aeroplane offers you an unusual and breathtaking view of the world.
sentences.cn: 飞机为你提供非凡的,令人惊诧不已的地球景色. (句中的view既有凝视的动作含义,又有风景的状态含义)

sentences.en: He nevertheless completed the film with breathtaking speed.
sentences.cn: 但他还是以惊人的速度拍完了这部电影。

sentences.en: If there's good skiing, breathtaking scenery and you don't need to catch a plane, all the better!
sentences.cn: 如果有好的滑雪场、令人叹为观止的美景，又不用赶飞机，那就再好不过了。

sentences.en: Our car was driving at a breathtaking speed down the expressway.
sentences.cn: 我们的车子沿着高速公路以惊人的速度行驶.

sentences.en: She danced with a grace and lightness that were breathtaking.
sentences.cn: 她的舞跳得优雅轻盈，令人惊叹。

sentences.en: Some of their football was breathtaking, a delight to watch.
sentences.cn: 他们踢的一些比赛非常精彩，极具观赏性。

sentences.en: The beauty of the sunrise is really breathtaking.
sentences.cn: 日出的美景真令人心旷神怡.

sentences.en: The breathtaking beauty of the rugged California wilderness has been captured under a clear, azure sky.
sentences.cn: 明朗蔚蓝的天空下面, 加利福尼亚崎岖的原野美得令人惊叹不已.

sentences.en: The breathtaking potentialities of mechanization set the minds of manufacturers and merchants on fire.
sentences.cn: 机械化的惊人潜力使制造厂和商人们激动不已。

sentences.en: The house has breathtaking views from every room.
sentences.cn: 这所房子的每个房间都能看到令人惊叹的美景。

sentences.en: The profundity of this book is achieved with breathtaking lightness.
The prospect from the balcony was breathtaking.
sentences.cn: 从阳台上看去景色美极了.

sentences.en: The view from my bedroom window was absolutely breathtaking.
sentences.cn: 我卧室窗外的景色美得令人窒息。

words.tran_cn: 惊人的；惊险的；令人激动的

trans.tran_cn: 非常激动人心的，惊人的，惊险的，使人透不过气来的
